name: Komari Theme PurCart EN
description: A frosted glass theme for Komari
author: Montia & Gemini

data.name: Show config edit button when logged in
data.help: Shows a config edit button on the right side of the title bar when logged in to help admins configure the theme

data.name: Main content width
data.help: Controls the max width of main content in vw. Recommended 80-90

data.name: Desktop background image URL
data.help: Supports a single image or an API. Use “|” to separate light and dark mode. Single value applies to both

data.name: Mobile background image URL
data.help: Same rules as desktop background. Leave empty to inherit desktop background

data.name: Enable video background
data.help: Use a video as background

data.name: Desktop video background URL
data.help: Use “|” to separate light and dark mode. Use silent videos. Large files may slow loading

data.name: Mobile video background URL
data.help: Same rules as desktop video. Leave empty to inherit desktop video

data.name: Background alignment
data.help: Two values separated by comma: size and position. Size options: cover, contain, fill. Position: center, top, bottom, left, right

data.name: Enable frosted glass effect
data.help: Adds a frosted glass effect to the main container

data.name: Blur intensity
data.help: Higher value increases blur. Recommended 5-20. Zero disables blur

data.name: Frosted glass background color
data.help: Recommended rgba values. Use “|” to separate light and dark mode

data.name: Enable transparent tag background
data.help: Makes tag backgrounds more transparent. Disable if tags become hard to read

data.name: Default tag color list
data.help: Tag colors used in sequence. Comma separated. Refer to Radix UI color list

data.name: Default theme color
data.help: Sets the default theme color

data.name: Enable localStorage settings
data.help: Uses user local settings before theme defaults. Disable to force theme defaults

data.name: Desktop default view
data.help: Sets default desktop view mode

data.name: Default appearance
data.help: Sets default appearance mode

data.name: Status card visibility
data.help: Control card visibility with key:value pairs separated by commas

data.name: Header style
data.help: Choose fixed or floating header

data.name: Enable left logo
data.help: Shows logo on the left of the title bar

data.name: Logo URL
data.help: Logo image URL

data.name: Enable header title
data.help: Shows title text on the left

data.name: Header title text
data.help: Leave empty to use site title

data.name: Enable search button
data.help: Search button appears on the right

data.name: Enable admin button
data.help: Admin button appears on the right

data.name: Footer style
data.help: Fixed, floating, follow content or hidden

data.name: Enable JSON-RPC2 API adaptation (experimental)
data.help: Uses JSON-RPC2 API in supported versions >=1.0.7 for better performance. Disable if issues occur

data.name: Show stats in header
data.help: Displays stats inside header on large screens. Restores default if space is insufficient

data.name: Merge groups bar with stats bar
data.help: Groups will merge into stats bar as dropdown

data.name: Enable stats bar
data.help: Displays stats bar by default

data.name: Enable sort control
data.help: Adds sorting controls for traffic and speed

data.name: Place offline nodes last
data.help: Offline nodes appear after online nodes

data.name: Enable group bar
data.help: Shows group bar

data.name: Default selected group
data.help: Fill with group name from backend. Leave empty for All

data.name: Mobile default view
data.help: Sets mobile default view

data.name: Enable SWAP
data.help: Shows SWAP info

data.name: Latency chart preview duration
data.help: Duration in hours for preview latency chart. Large values affect performance

data.name: Show hardware info in card
data.help: Shows CPU, memory, and disk specs under card title

data.name: Show values under progress bar
data.help: Shows actual values under memory, SWAP and disk bars

data.name: Traffic progress bar style
data.help: Choose circular or linear

data.name: Enable list view progress bar
data.help: Shows progress bars in list view

data.name: Enable Instance details
data.help: Shows Instance details by default

data.name: Enable latency chart
data.help: Shows latency chart

data.name: Enable connection breaks
data.help: Skips missing points and marks break positions

data.name: Max points for latency chart
data.help: 0 means unlimited. Recommended ≤2000

data.name: Custom UI texts (experimental)
data.help: Use key:value pairs. Values should be URL encoded. Recommended to configure through admin UI
